attributes.action: Destruction of Holy Shrines in Syria especially Lady Zainab (as) shrine
attributes.additional_details:
Recent events in Syria are escalating to an unacceptable level on both side's, this I believe is a proxy war that is being fought by external powers to create a safe road towards Iran.

However the support provided by Arab countries which is backed by Western powers to the extremists which is more of a religious war for these so called "jihadists" is now affecting the destruction of shrines which are held in high esteem by the shia community.

We want security to be provided to these shrines especially the shrine of our Prophet Muhammad's (saw) granddaughters shrine Lady Zainab (as)  in Damascus which has recently been attacked again.
